description.narrative: The project aims to support the four small towns of Paikgacha, Shakhipur, Fulbaria and Kolaroa, with the aims of: 1) Providing safe water to 31,450 people, 2) Providing sanitation to 27,755 people; 3) Providing hygiene education to 46,400 people. The project follows a rights perspective and prioritises disadvantaged population living in WASH hardship. It will establish a model for WASH service delivery for the poor.

activity-date.narrative: Date that project is due to end

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
